intro: Solenostemon rotundifolius, commonly known as the round-leafed stemless geranium, is a flowering plant native to southern Africa. It is a herbaceous perennial that typically grows to a height of about 10–20 centimeters. The plant features oval, fleshy leaves that are often covered in a powdery coating, and it produces small, pale purple to white flowers. It thrives in well-drained soil and prefers full sun to partial shade. Solenostemon rotundifolius is often cultivated for its ornamental value and is relatively easy to care for in suitable conditions.
